hero_text: Kugadzira nzvimbo isina nguva, kubatanidza vanhu, zvivakwa, uye manzwiro kuburikidza nemutauro wekuvaka.
contact_hours: Hofisi Hofisi: Muvhuro kusvika Chishanu, 9:00 am - 5:00 pm
projects_subtitle: Ongorora yedu ichangoburwa saiti basa uye ongororo
project2_title: üè¢ Kuongororwa Kwemhando: Kuongorora kwehunyanzvi kubva kuYC LEE Architect üè¢
about_subtitle: Mabasa edu makuru ari muPerak, chigunwe, neKeda, Johor, uye kuala lumpur, uye isu tinoitawo mapurojekiti ekunze.
philosophy_text: Architecture inopfuura kungova chimiro uye nzvimbo-iri hurukuro pakati pevanhu uye nharaunda. Isu tinovavarira kugadzirwa nzvimbo dzinoyevedza zvine mwero, kunaka, uye kusava nenguva.
mission_text: Isu takazvipira kugadzira zvigadzirwa zvinosanganisa mashandiro uye aesthetics. Kubva pamidziyo kusvika kune fomu, zvese zvinyoro-zvinhu-kuona kuti chirongwa chega chega chinotaura nyaya yayo yakasarudzika.
team_text: Chikwata chedu chinosanganisira shuwa vanogadzira nevanogadzira kubva kune dzakasiyana kurangwa, vachishanda pamwe chete kuti vape nyanzvi, yekugadzira, uye yekugadzirisa, uye nzvimbo dzekusimba dzepurogiramu yese.
